captions.text:
Light up someone's life with this Minecraft
diamond ore lamp and then craft yourself a
limited edition Battlefield watch.
I'm Jake and this is episode #17 of Game LÜT.

Wake up from under your Kirby quilt, fluff
your League of Legends Tibber pillow, put

on a Batman onesie, some super mario slippers
and make some Pokémon eggs for breakfast.

While eating, read Mind in Revolt, a prequel
novella to BioShock Infinite or just stare

at these awesome Metal gear Solid Cyborg Ninja
prints by artist Luke Parker.

Since it's getting cold outside, stay warm
with a creeper scarf, Assassin's Creed beanie,

Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Miles Prower Flight School
shirt, a Mass Effect Garrus hoodie and put

on your Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Backpack
complete with masks and weapons.

Then grab your keys off this awesome light
up N64 key holder and do some 3D maneuvering

with custom Attack on Titan shoes. Or to save
time travel in your Tardis Dress.

If it's raining outside grab your Umbrella...Corp
Umbrella. Ah, man but I forgot that at Michael's

house cus I was mesmerized by his Marvel Aquarium.
Quick question: If all the fish in an aquarium

die...does that make it a dead pool..59fifty
hat? Instead of going out in the rain, stay

inside and dress your pet rodents up in tiny
superhero costumes... That chinchilla is chinchillin.

Once you're done creating hamstars, build
these really cool lego Atari 2600 and Commodore

64 kits. Or you could build your own handheld
gaming system. The DIY Gamer Kit by Technology

Will Save Us provides you with the essentials
needed to make your own portable gaming device.

Connect and solder it together, then use the
included arduino board to program and code
a variety of different games...

But if you'd rather skip the creating a game
step, play Lumen. Lumen is a fun and free

puzzle platformer that finds you as a little
girl in a nightmare. You have to use your

camera to reveal hidden platforms and take
polaroids of objects in order to manipulate
them...

If you have a friend over, give them Finn's
sword from Adventure Time and give yourself

this incredible hand forged Zelda Master Sword
and battle. You can write about your glorious

victory in this beautiful hand made leather
Assassin's Creed sketch book.

If your friend hasn't succumb to their injuries,
play some Donkey Kong Jenga and while you

wait for the ambulance to arrive hang up these
really cool Pokémon prints by Rebekhaart...

Sadly, because of the rain the ambulance didn't
arrive in time so your friend is in Calvin
and Hobbs Limbo...tshirt.

Turn over a new leaf with an Animal Crossing
Stamp Set, subscribe to Vsauce3 for more Game

LÜT and run away from the police with this
Major League Gaming track jacket.

So you can find a link to that and to all
the LUT in the description below and as always,
thanks for watching.
